name: Staying Alive
description:
See how long you can survive the enemies. If you get enough money ($50), you can use z and x to buy health and ammo to help you out of tight situations. Challenge your friends to see how long you can survive. Will you die? Or will you survive??

Controls:

Use WASD to move,

Click to shoot,

R to reload,

Z to buy health (50 enemy dollars),

X to buy ammo(50 enemy dollars)
